scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:sanity && node adjust-path.js && npm run copy:assets

scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r pages dist/pages && cp -r index.html dist/index.html && cp -r css dist/css && cp -r images dist/images && cp -r scripts dist/scripts && mkdir -p dist/sanity-studio && cp -r sanity-studio/dist/static dist/sanity-studio/static && cp sanity-studio/fetchTagline.js dist/sanity-studio/ && cp sanity-studio/sanity-utils.js dist/sanity-studio/ && cp sanity-studio/fetchApproach.js dist/sanity-studio/
